TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: Though I have searched tirelessly, I have found no trace of any other survivors.. I am alone.
CASSAVA: Everywhere I search, the star system has been engulfed by this strange and deadly substance, visible only to the third eye.
CASSAVA: I believe the property of immersion must be the reason for the continued survival of aquatic species such as the jellyfish.. as well as my own.
CASSAVA: The Deep Storm Station must have been spared from the deadly matter's reach, thanks to the deep oceans surrounding it.
CASSAVA: If only more of us.. If only Daz had been aboard the Deep Storm Station with me...
CASSAVA: ..No, I cannot think that. If I am the only one who has survived, I am the only one who can learn about this calamity in their stead.
CASSAVA: I only hope to find closure in learning what I can, in the time I have left.
